description.p: A religious artifact of The Church of the Ascendant. They say the Ascendant Dragon will choose their champion through this artifact
Dormant. The Ascendant's Judgement grants the following benefits in its dormant state:

ul.li: You gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls when wielding this weapon.
After you take a rest, roll a d6. This determines the Form of the weapon. The Ascendant's Judgement deals an additonal d4 of damage of that type.

Awakened. When the Ascendant's judgement reaches an awakened state, it gains the following properties:
The weapon’s bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +2.
The Elemental damage increaases to 2d4. You no longer have to roll for what category the Elemental damage comes from.
You can cast Green Flame Blade through the greataxe, dealing damage matching the Ascendant's Judgement's current Form.
Exalted. When the Ascendant's judgement reaches an exalted state, it gains the following properties:
The weapon’s bonus to attack and damage rolls increases to +3.
The Elemental damage increaases to 3d4.
You can now choose the Elemental damage after a rest.
You can deal an extra 5d8 damage of the Ascendant's chosen damage type as a bonus action 3 times per long rest. x
